channel.title: There Is a hacker on my server how do i get rid?
channel.description: theres a hacker on my server with invalid name like ...,[;,,.. and he comes on with dif names and hes said hell null it everyday and its getting anoying he keeps crashing how do i get rid of him forever?

item.title: There Is a hacker on my server how do i get rid?
item.dc:creator: @heroisgay heroisgay
item.description:
@heroisgay wrote:

Tbh ip banning isnt going to help much when he changes his ip like every 5 minutes,this worked for me it might work for you:

i hate the syipkpker thingy. doesnt everyone? Als, if you try to ipban it, it can change it’s ip or something like that. But, it doesn’t change the first part of the ip. So, what you can do is block all ports from entering who’s ip starts with a certain number sequence. For example, this is what i did on my server.

the syipkpker who was trying to connect to my server’s ip was ..**.*
so, in bannedips.txt, i type in:
Code:

#1.#2*

here is another example.
ip is: pool-....***.dsl-w.verizon.net:***
just do:
Code:

pool-#1-#2-*

This will just block the one person trying to use the syipkpker bot.

Read full topic

item.title: There Is a hacker on my server how do i get rid?
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

client.java:13614: cannot find symbol symbol : variable banHandler location: class server server.banHandler.appendToBanned(playerName); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

this the code i get when i did what u just said

item.source: There Is a hacker on my server how do i get rid?

item.title: There Is a hacker on my server how do i get rid?
item.dc:creator: @jackeychan jackeychan
item.description:
@jackeychan wrote:

wow i guess im gonna have to post this
search for this in client.java

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

under it add

public String IllegalUsernameChars[] = {"~", "!", "@", "#", "$", "SILABSOFT", "PK", "PKER", "SILAB", "(", ")", ";", "'", ",", ".", "/", "?", ":", "[", "{", "]", "}", "|", "SYI", "owner", "%", "^", "&", "*", "SYIPKPKER", "SYIPK"};

next search for

playerLastConnect = connectedFrom;

under it add

for (int j = 0; j < IllegalUsernameChars.length; j++) { if (playerName.toLowerCase().contains(IllegalUsernameChars[j])) { if (checkbannedusers() != 5) { server.banHandler.appendToBanned(playerName); server.playerHandler.kickNick = playerName; } } }
the above code automatically kicks and bans people who try and log on with names like #@$@#%@ the banhandler has to be modified depending on yours

Read full topic

item.title: There Is a hacker on my server how do i get rid?

Use hamachi and ban him from your hamachi.

Don’t use hamachi. Nobody will use your server.

The best thing will be to add some sort of system to disconnect players properly if they are a “so called” null.

item.title: There Is a hacker on my server how do i get rid?
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

Open the characters file

Open one of his names

Find his “last connected: #” or something like that

Copy that IP (the # part)

Open the data folder

Open IP bans

Paste it

Save it

Compile and restart runserver

Should block him forever unless he’s on a proxy or something

Read full topic
